question.text: The cylinder contains <math><mn>100</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math> of an ideal gas <math><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">w</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mo>.</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>40</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></mrow><mo>/</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></mfenced></math> at <math><mn>27</mn><mo>°</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></math> and <math><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math>. pressure. In transportation the cylinder fell and a dent was created. The valve present cannot keep the pressure greater than <math><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math>. Hence <math><mn>10</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math> of a gas got leaked out. The volume of the container before and after dent is-

options.text: <math><mn>30.8</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mn>27.7</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi></math>

<math><mn>27.7</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mn>30.8</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi></math>

<math><mn>30.8</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mn>30.8</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi></math>

<math><mn>27.7</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mn>27.7</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi></math>

solution.text:
Before dent vol. of gas=nRTP

=10040 × 0.082×3002=30.75 L

After dent vol. of gas=nRTP

=9040 × 0.082×3002=27.675 L
